info.name: Warframe.Market Mellow(er)
info.description:
Another Warframe.Market dark theme.
Compact, no frills.
Customizable theme color.
info.additionalInfo:
(Known Issues)
*Untested on resolutions above 1080p
*dropdown menus need adjustment
*support for mobile screens dropped

(Update 7/6/19)
*Added support for auctions page
*Updated to support global changes

(Update 1/14/19)
*Decreased overall brightness.
*Remembered my password.

(WIP Update 12/28/18)
*Added styling for listing editing page.
*Added styling for settings page.
*Added styling for cookies disclaimer.
*Changed placeholder text color to be less terrible.

(QP 04 12/27/18)
*adjusted icons for blueprints

(QP 03 12/27/18)
*Themed statistics page
*Fixed item name regression

(QP 02 12/27/18)
*Themed message page

(QP 01 12/27/18)
*Added support for 50% width(1080p)

(WIP Release 12/27/18)
*Functionality currently limited to 1080p full-scale use.
*Tested with 1209 x 968 - 1920 x 968 scaling.
